parameters.definition: Demand for the product in each period i
Cost to hold one unit of product in storage for one period
Cost to switch the production from one period to another

description: Minimize the total cost of the production and inventory schedule over \param{T} periods, given \param{Deliver} for each period, a \param{StorageCost} for holding inventory, and a \param{SwitchCost} for changing production between periods.
